title: Invitation
verses:
We're trav'ling home to Heav'n above—Will you
To sing the Sa-vior's dy-ing love— Will you
And millions now are on the road—Will you

go! Will you go? } Millions have reach'd this
go! Will you go? }
blest abode, A-noint-ed kings and priests to God.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Evangelical invitation to join the journey to heaven
